summary: Senior data scientist with over 8 years of experience in Python, machine learning, natural language processing (NLP), computer vision, and big data analytics. Specialized in optimizing e-commerce operations and forecasting with state-of-the-art models such as TFT, NHITS, NBEATS, and LightGBM, consistently achieving forecast accuracies above 90%. Expert in translating complex insights for cross-functional teams, with publications in high-impact journals, 2nd place worldwide in datasource.ai (2020), keynote speaker at events like FLISOL, and interviewed on ProinChile podcast on Spotify. Strong background in NLP techniques, including semantic distances between concepts (e.g., embeddings and conceptual similarity), prompt engineering with rules and MCP, pattern detection, and computer vision (e.g., image segmentation, OCR, object detection)

description: Developed advanced machine learning models to optimize e-commerce operations, improving inventory and sales forecasting accuracy using state-of-the-art models like TFT, NHITS, NBEATS, and LightGBM
Collaborated with international teams to define priority air cargo strategies and develop priority models, achieving forecast accuracies consistently above 90%, increasing logistics efficiency by 20%

Developed and implemented a machine learning ensemble model for time series, adopted by multiple teams, that outperformed Meta's Prophet model by up to 10 percentage points in forecast accuracy, significantly improving data-driven decision making
Led the development of predictive models for national and imported product sales, improving accuracy in promotions, coupons, and store distribution, with errors below 5% MAPE
Directed the Catman forecasting team, delivering analytical solutions that optimized product placement and sales strategies in new sales centers in Peru
Presented actionable insights to stakeholders, connecting technical and business teams
Monitored and validated credit risk models, preparing detailed performance reports
Developed customer prospecting models, improving acquisition strategies
Built a qualitative model to analyze company operations, identifying growth opportunities and creating KPIs to monitor executive performance
Led research on customer behavior, delivering hyper-personalized dashboards that reduced customer churn by 30% and increased profitability
Wrote two articles for the company's official blog, explaining key findings in an accessible manner. [Link.](https://blog.capitaria.com/como-perder-en-el-trading)

experience.company: Ministry of Transportation and Telecommunications, Chile
description: Led the technical counterpart in public tenders, including the 'Foreign Trade Logistics Barometer 2020' project. [Link.](https://www.observatoriologistico.cl/estudios/estudio-actualizacion-y-aplicacion-del-barometro-de-la-logistica-de-comercio-exterior-2020?id=5db6eecd5f5d64004bf74e59)
Developed port cargo prediction models with a mean squared error below 1%, delivered directly to the Transportation Undersecretariat
Temporarily led the analytics area for Chile and Peru, reorganizing teams after COVID impact using agile methodologies
Developed scrapers for public market data and used transparency law data to create a tender alert system, achieving a competitive advantage of several months
Developed OCR to break captchas
Developed NLP models to detect patterns in public markets
Brain Connectivity Analysis through combined use of functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging and Tractography (FONDECYT ACT 1161427)
Development of Ant Colony Algorithm for Image Edge Detection, used for artifact segmentation in brain magnetic resonance imaging
Developed predictive models for concrete compressive strength using multilayer perceptrons optimized with grid search
Analyzed heavy metals in drinking water using X-ray fluorescence techniques
